objects.text:
✦ 925 Sterling Silver
✦ Rose Gold Pink Drop Design
✦ Perfect Gift for Her
✦ 6-Month Warranty Included

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a chic and feminine aesthetic centered around a premium jewelry promotion. The background is divided diagonally with a soft blush-to-rose gradient on the left and a rich plum-toned gradient on the right. The top-left section contains two bold main text layers — "heading_1" and "heading_2" — showcasing the product’s timeless elegance in uppercase, using a strong slab serif font. Below that, a flowing script font in "subheading" adds a delicate contrast, mentioning the product type. "description" lists product USPs in a clean sans-serif with icon bullets. The "price" is prominently displayed with a bold label, and a maroon button ("cta_background") labeled "cta" below invites action. The right side highlights the earring product with vibrant clarity via the "product_image".

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Pink: `#F9E0E3`
- Rose Blush: `#F5C3CB`
- Deep Rose: `#F1A7B4`
- Dark Plum: `#7D3C50`
- Wine Purple: `#582E44`
- Text Dark Brown: `#4A2438`
- CTA Text: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings with a soft and luxurious color palette. Dominated by rose gold (#F4A7B9), this warm hue forms the base structure, seamlessly blending with blush pink (#FDC8D3) teardrop-shaped accents. Sparkling white crystals (#FFFFFF) add brilliance and visual contrast, while subtle hints of silver-gray (#D9D9D9) within the marquise-cut stones bring balance and depth. The rose gold setting wraps around the stones with a polished, reflective surface, highlighting the contrast without clashing. These hues blend through reflection and shadow play, making an ideal banner palette soft pinks, rose gold, white, and silver—luxurious yet delicate.
